questions_and_notes: Can we use  synoptic data here? Why not?
specific_issues: 7:Deprecate? Eliminate one of 'point' or 'mean' variable options.
8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
comment: Relative vorticity is the upward component of the vorticity vector i.e. the component which arises from horizontal velocity.
